name: Spicy Ranch Party Mix
author: Ashley Baron Rodriguez
summary: This is the perfect party snack to have lying around. It's salty, a bit spicy, and loaded with bright herb flavor. Store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: 3 cups crispy wheat cereal squares (such as Wheat Chex®)
3 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
3 cups crispy corn cereal squares (such as Corn Chex®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Melt butter in a small saucepan
Add Worcestershire sauce, minced garlic, dill, parsley, chives, salt, garlic powder, and chipotle powder
Place wheat, rice, and corn cereal squares in a large bowl
Spread mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring once halfway through, until toasted and fragrant, about 1 hour
